labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://gaypornhdfree.com/?ref=mygaysites

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
I have uninstalled and reinstalled the Adguard app multiple times could doing that interfere with getting updates? Or could that cause the base filter that Alex added a new code specifically for gaypornhdfree.com to no longer work? My iPhone is iPhone 7 Plus operating system 15.7.1 safari version 15.7.1

All I know is now if I click the updating button on the adguard app it saids no updates found. And the website is now detecting my adblocker every time no matter how many refreshes of the page I do. Could someone also please tell me what are the exact filters I must have enabled for in safari protection of the app in order for the added code Alex did to work? 

I have set up the six Adguard extensions on settings-safari of Aduard custom-Adguard general-Aduard other-Adguard privacy-Adguard security-Adguard-social 

each one is enabled 

I have gone to gaypornhdfree.com selected the aA icon on the left of the url bar of safari picked manage extensions and made sure adguard was enabled for advanced protection

I also clicked on adguard on the list shown when you click aA and checked to make sure safari protection specifically for that website is enabled

I have went also to setting-safari and selected

delete history and website data I have also selected close tabs afterwards 


I have added the user rule that Alex told me to add I have done everything I believe I was told of the exact order

but just in case could someone please direct me to the steps again of the exact order 

to make sure I have not missed a step or done it in the wrong order





2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

If someone could please respond of the exact order of the steps needed for this to work I could implement then immediately 


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> [#136984 (comment)](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/136984#issuecomment-1344441740) = yes
> 
> [#136984 (comment)](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/136984#issuecomment-1344546161) = leave open AG app 60 seconds after last gray bar disappear. Later disable sections other than Ad Blocking (aka AdGuard Base Filter and AdGuard Mobile Filter) if page still detect AdGuard.
> 
> Turn on Filter lists of annoying items, anti-social media and those for protection privacy only after the adblock detection message disappears, and do it so that 1 subscription per section arrives (Continuing to wait until the last gray bar and 60 seconds to avoid filtering failure). Turning on one by one may allow us to determine what Filter list is malfunctioning with the site - but there is no guarantee that someone will quickly catch what is causing the error in the Filter list.
> 
> At worst scenario, you need technical assistance from the "developers" of the application. Someone maybe can direct you how to write to them (form / e-mail / forum section).

So let me see if I got this exact you want me to reinstall AdGuard app after uninstalling it than you want to keep the app open and wait for the last grey bar update on the bottom of the app to disappear than you want me to enable only  adblocking of base filter and the Mobil filter 
Go back to gaypornhdfree.com 

check to make sure the adblocker is not detected at all ever?

And than this is where I get confuse are you than wanting me to enable each filter but one at a time of where I enable one wait for gray bar to disappear than go to the site see if adblocker gets detected if not go back to app and enable another filter wait for gray bar to disappear than go to site and see if adblocker is detected of a sequence pattern to figure out which filter is causing the site to still sometimes detect the adblocker?


I don’t understand what you mean by this thou 

“and do it so that 1 subscription per section arrives” ?



the (Continuing to wait until the last gray bar and 60 seconds to avoid filtering failure)

is what you mean by when you enable a filter wait 60 seconds and for the grey bar to disappear than go to the site gaypornhdfree.com see if adblocker is detected if not go back to app repeat the process over and over to figure which filter is causing the sometimes error?

am I correct of what you meant Krystian?

And could you answer what you meant by the 1 subscription per section arrives?

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://gaypornhdfree.com/?ref=mygaysites

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
I have uninstalled and reinstalled the Adguard app multiple times could doing that interfere with getting updates? Or could that cause the base filter that Alex added a new code specifically for gaypornhdfree.com to no longer work? My iPhone is iPhone 7 Plus operating system 15.7.1 safari version 15.7.1

All I know is now if I click the updating button on the adguard app it saids no updates found. And the website is now detecting my adblocker every time no matter how many refreshes of the page I do. Could someone also please tell me what are the exact filters I must have enabled for in safari protection of the app in order for the added code Alex did to work? 

I have set up the six Adguard extensions on settings-safari of Aduard custom-Adguard general-Aduard other-Adguard privacy-Adguard security-Adguard-social 

each one is enabled 

I have gone to gaypornhdfree.com selected the aA icon on the left of the url bar of safari picked manage extensions and made sure adguard was enabled for advanced protection

I also clicked on adguard on the list shown when you click aA and checked to make sure safari protection specifically for that website is enabled

I have went also to setting-safari and selected

delete history and website data I have also selected close tabs afterwards 


I have added the user rule that Alex told me to add I have done everything I believe I was told of the exact order

but just in case could someone please direct me to the steps again of the exact order 

to make sure I have not missed a step or done it in the wrong order





2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

If someone could please respond of the exact order of the steps needed for this to work I could implement then immediately 


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> [#136984 (comment)](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/136984#issuecomment-1344441740) = yes
> 
> [#136984 (comment)](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/136984#issuecomment-1344546161) = leave open AG app 60 seconds after last gray bar disappear. Later disable sections other than Ad Blocking (aka AdGuard Base Filter and AdGuard Mobile Filter) if page still detect AdGuard.
> 
> Turn on Filter lists of annoying items, anti-social media and those for protection privacy only after the adblock detection message disappears, and do it so that 1 subscription per section arrives (Continuing to wait until the last gray bar and 60 seconds to avoid filtering failure). Turning on one by one may allow us to determine what Filter list is malfunctioning with the site - but there is no guarantee that someone will quickly catch what is causing the error in the Filter list.
> 
> At worst scenario, you need technical assistance from the "developers" of the application. Someone maybe can direct you how to write to them (form / e-mail / forum section).

So wait the website gaypornhdfree.com is working for you of not detecting your AdGuard every single time you select a video and play it?
